name: Mulletman and the Molemen
description:
It’s judgement day on the world of the Molemen. The Wall of Fire is coming! Help Mulletman kick and headbutt the Molemen to safety.

Mulletman and the Molemen is an intense side scrolling platformer. Stay just ahead of the Wall of Fire and help Mulletman rescue the Molemen in 25 action packed levels.

Features:
25 Original Levels
Original Sound Track
Story and Speed Run Modes
Delightful Pixel Art
A Charming Overworld
And most importantly, Kicking and Headbutting!
